document_data.name: Ala'i ibn-Hasim
document_data.mainbody: '''Ala'i ibn-Hasim''' was a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[sha'ir]] within the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|86}}
document_data.Activities: Ala'i was in charge of the [[Hall of the Treasury]]. His official title was Keeper of the Treasury. In order to prevent him from misusing funds, or betraying the [[Grand Caliph]] in other ways, Ala'i accepted a ''[[geas]]''. Ala'i helped secure the treasury by placing ''[[Paralyze|paralysis]]'' glyphs throughout the building.
